Openfort - Barcelona, CAT-ESP - Full time on-site

We're a startup of 5 people working on providing developer tooling to games and gaming ecosystems to integrate blockchain. We've developed an open-source key management solution to make players custodians of their keys and created 100k+ smart accounts in EVM chains.

We're looking for backend/dev-ops engineers (typescript, Go)

Read more: https://jobs.openfort.xyz Apply by sending an email Joan Alavedra (CEO) directly at joan@openfort.xyz
